Template Function surface_tension_water¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
float_t surface_tension_water(float_t T)¶

Surface tension of liquid water in . From Prof. Borrmann, based on equation 5-12 from Pruppacher and Klett (1997) Validity range:

Return

Surface tension

Parameters

  • T: Temperature in Kelvin
